00013 void SafePWM::InitSafePWM()
00014 {
00015     m_safetyHelper = new MotorSafetyHelper(this);
00016     m_safetyHelper->SetSafetyEnabled(false);
00017 }
00018 
00023 SafePWM::SafePWM(UINT32 channel): PWM(channel)
00024 {
00025     InitSafePWM();
00026 }

00035     InitSafePWM();

00040  * @param timeout The timeout (in seconds) for this motor object

00071 void SafePWM::StopMotor()
00072 {
00073     SetRaw(kPwmDisabled);
00074 }

00101 void SafePWM::SetSpeed(float speed)
00102 {
